data.name: App_CAHCredit
data.value: Cards and official game rules thanks to Cards Against Humanity
data.comment: This text credits Cards Against Humanity

data.name: App_CAHLicense
data.comment: This text labels the license used by Cards Against Humanity

data.name: App_Subtitle
data.comment: This is the subtitle of the app

data.name: App_Title
data.comment: This is the title of the app

data.name: Command_BrowseCards
data.comment: This label appears on a control which allows the user to browse all the cards

data.name: Command_CzarPickCards
data.comment: This label appears on a control allowing the czar to pick their favourite answer

data.name: Command_JoinGame
data.comment: This label appears on a control which joins a game

data.name: Command_PlayerPickCards
data.comment: This label appears on a control which allows a player to send their white cards to the czar

data.name: Command_StartGame
data.comment: This label appears on a control which starts a new game

data.name: DialogButton_Cancel
data.comment: This label is for a 'Cancel' button in a dialog

data.name: DialogButton_No
data.comment: This label is for a 'No' button in a dialog

data.name: DialogButton_Okay
data.comment: This label is for a 'Okay' button in a dialog

data.name: DialogButton_Yes
data.comment: This label is for a 'Yes' button in a dialog

data.name: DialogMessage_ClientLeavingGame
data.value: Are you sure you want to quit? You'll ruin it for everyone else!
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when a client tries to leave a game

data.name: DialogMessage_ClientLeavingLobby
data.value: The game hasn't even started yet! Are you sure you want to quit?
data.comment: This message is shown when the user tries to leave the 'Join Game' lobby, after having connected to a match

data.name: DialogMessage_Disconnected
data.value: Looks like you've been disconnected from the server, and we don't know why.
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the client is disconnected from the server with a unknown reason

data.name: DialogMessage_InvalidPin
data.value: We don't know how you've done it... but you've connected to the server with the wrong pin. Sorry bud, try again!
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the client connects to a server with an invalid pin, and is consquently disconnected

data.name: DialogMessage_KickedFromServer
data.value: Congratulations! You've been kicked from the game
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when a client is kicked from the game

data.name: DialogMessage_KickSelf
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the host tries to kick themself from the game

data.name: DialogMessage_ServerClosed
data.value: Looks like the host quit the game. Sorry!
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the host closes the server

data.name: DialogMessage_ServerFull
data.value: Sorry bud, but this server's full. Try asking the host to increase the number of max players.
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the client tries to connect to a server that is full

data.name: DialogMessage_ServerLeavingGame
data.value: My god. Are you really this cruel? Are you even aware of the responsibility you shouldered when you took on the role of host?! Are you sure that you want to shut down the entire game for everyone else?!?!
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the host tries to shut down the server

data.name: DialogMessage_ServerLeavingLobby
data.value: People are already queueing up to play! Are you sure you want to deprive them of this wonderful opportunity by closing the server?
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the host tries to close the server before beginning the game

data.name: DialogMessage_ServerLimitChanged
data.value: The server host changed the number of maximum players, and you didn't make the cut. If you've got a problem, now would be a good time to take it up with the host.
data.comment: This dialog message is shown when the client is kicked from a server that has had it's maximum player limit decreased

data.name: DialogTitle_BlameServer
data.comment: This dialog title appears when the server causes a client to disconnect

data.name: DialogTitle_Default
data.comment: This is the default dialog title

data.name: DialogTitle_Disconnected
data.comment: This dialog title is shown when the client is disconnected from the server with a unknown reason

data.name: DialogTitle_InvalidPin
data.comment: This dialog title is shown when the client connects to a server with an invalid pin, and is consequently disconnected

data.name: DialogTitle_KickSelf
data.comment: This dialog title is shown when the host tries to kick themself from the game

data.name: DialogTitle_LeavingGame
data.comment: This title is shown when the user tries to leave a game

data.name: Header_BlackCards
data.comment: This header appears above a list of black cards

data.name: Header_CardBrowser
data.comment: This header appears on the card browser page

data.name: Header_WhiteCards
data.comment: This header appears above a list of white cards

data.name: Hint_GamePin
data.comment: This hint appears on a control which allows the user to enter a game pin

data.name: Hint_PlayerName
data.comment: This hint appears in a textbox which allows the user to enter their player name

data.name: Label_ConnectedToServer
data.value: You're in! Wait for the host to start!
data.comment: This label appears when the client has successfully connected to the server

data.name: Label_GamePin
data.comment: This label appears near a control which shows the game pin

data.name: Label_MaxPlayers
data.comment: This label appears beside the maximum number of players allowed into the game

data.name: Leaderboard_You
data.comment: This suffix appears after the player's own name on the leaderboard

data.name: ToolTip_CAHHelp
data.comment: This tooltip appears on a control which opens the CAH game rules

data.name: ToolTip_KickPlayer
data.comment: This tooltip appears on a control allowing the server owner to kick a player

data.name: ToolTip_NavigateBack
data.comment: This tooltip appears on a control which navigates the user back to the last viewed page

data.name: ToolTip_RefreshGamePin
data.comment: This tooltip appears on a control which refreshes the pin of a new game
